name: Space Pong Invader
description:
LudumDare41 Submission.

Welcome Space traveler !

Our game combines Pong and Space invaders
Here you need to kill all the enemies alone or with your friends !

 With a friend? Choose who can control the ship and who can control the paddle.

 Alone? Don’t worry! The Paddle have an auto-control!

 More enemy killed => More point for you!

Our game also include :

  •  Different kinds of enemies
  •  Bonus to help you (more speed etc)
  •  Increase difficulty (more waves => more difficult)

How many waves will you survive?
